alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 6:00PM EST until November 09 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Mainly at higher elevations. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. Total snow accumulations of less than an inch. * WHERE...Onondaga and Cortland counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible where untreated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest chance for a light glaze of ice will be across the higher terrain in southern Onondaga County and Cortland County this evening. Ice will be mainly confined to colder, elevated surfaces, but could also impact bridges and overpasses. Temperatures will rise above freezing later tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
